title: New Year, Wild Goals? Follow This 5-Point Guide to Tracking and Unpacking Your Cycling Training
content:
USA Cycling's legendary trainer Jim Miller shares simple ways self-coached athletes can decode their data and fast-forward their fitness in the new year.

Read the full article at New Year, Wild Goals? Follow This 5-Point Guide to Tracking and Unpacking Your Cycling Training on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
